A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Welp\, if Force Awakens and Rogue One were more like well crafted nostalgia tributes\, and the prequels were just\, bleh\, The Last Jedi is the best\, most inventive and interesting Star Wars movie since Empire Strikes Back.\n\nIt revives a sense of wonder and originality to the films that are lost under the three decades of pop culture phenomena\, and the tropes and formulas that came with it.
